descriptions.description: A more diverse contributor base attracts a wider pool of potential new contributors to the project.
As contributors skill up, they graduate from the New Contributors stock, reducing its level.
Developer turnover directly drains the stock of Core Developers as they leave the project.
The promotion rate increases the Core Developer stock by moving experienced contributors into this role.
The promotion rate decreases the Experienced Contributors stock as they are moved into core roles.
The skill-up flow increases the Experienced Contributors stock by transitioning new contributors into it.
Effective mentorship accelerates skill development by providing direct guidance and tacit knowledge.
Clear documentation and guides accelerate skill acquisition by providing accessible, structured knowledge.
Mentorship increases the promotion rate by preparing experienced contributors for core developer responsibilities.
More core developers increase the project's capacity for providing direct mentorship to others.
